assessmentTitle: Monads! Test your knowledge [Haskell demo project]
instructions:
This quiz is limited to 5 questions only. 
You feel confident? Click on the START button to start the quiz. 
Once you're done answering, submit your answers to get your result.
Good luck!

questions.questionTitle: What is the type of return?

answers.answerTitle: Monad m => m a -> (a -> m b) -> m b
Monad m => a -> (a -> m b) -> m b

questions.questionTitle: Which typeclass constraint is required in the declaration of Writer monad?
Which of these statements is true?

answers.answerTitle: Every functor is also a monad.
Every monad is also a functor.
Monad m => m a -> (a -> m b) -> m b
Monad m => m a -> (a -> b) -> m b
Monad m => m a -> (m a -> b) -> m b
Monad m => m a -> (m a -> m b) -> m b

questions.questionTitle: Which of these functions is identical to return in a monad?
